channel.title: The Weather in Brooklyn
channel.description: An automated podcast bringing you your daily weather forecast for Brooklyn, NY.
channel.itunes:summary: An automated podcast bringing you your daily weather forecast for Brooklyn, NY.
channel.itunes:author: Michael S. Hoffman

item.title: 1: Tuesday, December 14th, 2021
item.description:
This is The Weather in Brooklyn. Welcome. Here is your forecast for Tuesday, December 14th, 2021.

The Weather in Brooklyn was created by Michael Hoffman and is generated automatically. You can view and contribute to its source code.

Weather forecast courtesy of the National Weather Service. Music by Jascha Hoffman. Audio logo by Nate Heller. Photograph by Alex Simpson.
